intro: Aizoon galenioides, commonly known as the Galen's aizoon, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a member of the Apiaceae family, characterized by its aromatic foliage and umbellate inflorescences. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in sunny to partially shaded environments. Its small white or pale yellow flowers bloom in late spring to early summer. Aizoon galenioides is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits.
